original_title: Blackmore's Night Shadow Of The Moon Beyond The Sunset 2014 DVD
overview: This DVD includes interviews with Ritchie Blackmore and Candice Night In their home in Long Island, N.Y. 1997. Talking about the making of Shadow Of The Moon. Ritchie's guitar collection and 3. Promo videos: Renaissance Faire, No Second Chance, Shadow Of The Moon.
title: Blackmore's Night Shadow Of The Moon Beyond The Sunset 2014 DVD
